subheader: I'm an API developed by Michael Burdick to help run tabletop RPGs!
block_text_1: This page is a little web demo designed to show off the capabilities of Maskmaker, a RESTful API designed to help Game Masters run tabletop RPGs by dynamically generating character profiles in games
block_text_2: Use this page to generate some random characters! Additional functionality, such as the generation and use of Markov Chains for random name generation, is available via directly calling the API
